remarks: The series ` G ` is uniformly convergent on the compact region ` U ` , which describes a circle of radius ` R ` with holes of size ` 1 / R ` around the poles of the gamma function.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jul-2017.)
statement:
lgamgulm.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. NN ) $.
lgamgulm.u $e |- U = { x e. CC | ( ( abs ` x ) <_ R /\ A. k e. NN0 ( 1 / R ) <_ ( abs ` ( x + k ) ) ) } $.
lgamgulm.g $e |- G = ( m e. NN |-> ( z e. U |-> ( ( z x. ( log ` ( ( m + 1 ) / m ) ) ) - ( log ` ( ( z / m ) + 1 ) ) ) ) ) $.
lgamgulm $p |- ( ph -> seq 1 ( oF + , G ) e. dom ( ~~>u ` U ) ) $.
$d R k m x z $.
$d U m z $.
$d k m x $.
$d m ph x z $.
